definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: hinder, restrain, frustrate (Ar. (nw0’) na0’a0’ (or na0’a) rise with difficulty, rise against one (Frey), III. contend with, Lane:2861);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 2 mpl. [[תנואון]] Nu 32:7 Kt, but read Hiph. (so Qr), cf. Di.

restrain, forbid (performance of vow), sq. acc. pers. Nu 30:6, Nu 30:6, Nu 30:9, Nu 30:12; frustrate (device of people), subj. ´[[י]], sq. acc. rei, Ps 33:10 (‖[[הֵפִיר]]); refuse Ps 141:5 ((text dub. v. Che).
restrain, make averse the heart (acc.) Nu 32:7 (sq. [[מֵעֲבׂר]]), v:Nu 32:9 (sq. [[לְבִלְתִּי־באׁ]]).
